org.gradoop.flink.util

Class GradoopFlinkConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.common.config.GradoopConfig<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>
      • org.gradoop.flink.util.GradoopFlinkConfig
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemporalGradoopConfig

    public class GradoopFlinkConfig
extends GradoopConfig<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>
    Configuration for Gradoop running on Flink.
